TableSpec.Author: Technical Training

TextField.Name: NAME
TextField.Description: The name of the parameter set

Trigger.Name: TR_USR_INVENTORYPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL: create trigger TR_USR_INVENTORYPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_INVENTORYPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = 'a28d4f17-53fe-48d9-85bc-37e12884dc00'; end
